Description: Speak with Sir Remson again to learn about the various quest icons you will encounter in your aventures.
Name: [Journey] Welcome to Albion
SourceText:
Hail and well met, dude. I am Sir Remson, Mayor of this fine town of Holtham. You are here because you have chosen to swear fealty to the realm of Albion. We are locked in a bloody war againtst the loathsome forces of Hibernia and the barbaric hordes of Midgard.

You have come here to Constantine's Sound to begin your preparation for the battles ahead. You will want to begin by learning how to identify when there are quests or tasks available to you. These quests will be paramount in your advancement through your seasons and will provide you with the equipment and experience you will need to meet your foes on the field of battle.

Let us not waste any more time, there is much to learn and even more to do.
Continue speaking with me for a very quick explanation about the various icons you will encounter as your adventure through these lands.

Welcome home, brave dude.|During your travels across the realm you will encounter the opportunity to participate in Quests which you can locate by the icons which Willem here will display for you.

Let us begin !

New User Journey Quest Icon
Lesson Quest Icon
Classic Quest Icon
Pending Quest Goal Icon
Quest Completion Icon

Or are you already familiar with these icons ?

 If you need a refresher course, don't hesitate to stop by and speak to me again.
StepText: Speak with Sir Remson to learn about Quest Icons.|Speak with Sir Remson again to learn about the various quest icons you will encounter in your adventures.

Description:
Kill 3 small black bears roaming the field northeast of Sir Remson, then report to Lieutenant Cantren nearby. If you have difficulty finding them, open your map.
(NOTE: Type /map to open your Map Window.)
FinishText:
I have been expecting you, <Player>! I see that you have been helping to protect Holtham against the malevolent creatures nearby.

We will require more of your assistance, brave <Race>, and for it we shall not fail to reward you.
Name: [Journey] Black Bear Threat
SourceName: Sir Remson;27|black bear cub;27|black bear cub;27|black bear cub;27
SourceText:
You may have noticed several people throughout town with the Lesson Quest icon over their head. You should feel free to travel around town and speak with these individuals to see what you may learn.

If you are ready to become prepared for combat in our war torn land, however, I have a task for you. To the northeast of my location a population of small black bears have been slowly accumulating. These creatures have been attacking innocent townsfolk at random, and they must be cleared from the area.

I have marked your map with the location of these creatures so that you may find them and reduce their numbers. When you have finished, I would like you to report to Lieutenant Cantren who can be found north of me, along the road to lower Holtham.|||
StepText: Exterminate 3 small black bears|Exterminate 2 small black bears|Exterminate a small black bear|Report to Lieutenant Cantren north of Sir Remson
TargetName: small black bear;27|small black bear;27|small black bear;27|Lieutenant Cantren;27

Description: Clear the path over the marsh to Caer Claret. Kill at least 5 zephyr nymphs in the Hills of Claret and return to Captain Giberun.
FinishText: Thank you <Player>. Accept this coin and experience as reward for your hard work here today.
Name: Clear the Path
SourceName: Captain Giberun;236|zephyr nymph;236|zephyr nymph;236|zephyr nymph;236|zephyr nymph;236|zephyr nymph;236
SourceText: I'm glad to see you <Player>. We've been running supplies back and forth to Caer Claret for some time now. The siege fairs well for us, but we've run into problems with the zephir nymphs. Those fighty little creatures are intent on stealing and looting our caravans. <Player> can I task you with clearing the path for our caravans to Claret ? |||||
StepText:
Clear the path over the marsh to Caer Claret. Kill at least 5 zephyr nymphs in the Hills of Claret and return to Captain Giberun.|Kill 4 remaining zephyr nymphs in the Hills of Claret.

|Kill 3 remaining zephyr nymphs in the Hills of Claret.
|Kill 2 remaining zephyr nymphs in the Hills of Claret.|Kill 1 remaining zephyr nymph in the Hills of Claret.

|Go back to Captain Giberun to retrieve your rewards.
TargetName: zephyr nymph;236|zephyr nymph;236|zephyr nymph;236|zephyr nymph;236|zephyr nymph;236|Captain Giberun;236

Description: Rat colonies have overtaken the captain's flanking line. Kill at least 5 rats in Killaloe and return to Captain Hayworth. (NOTE: Upon completion of this quest you will be awared 10 bounty points)
FinishText: Thank you <Player>. Accept this coin and experience as reward for your hard work here today.
Name: Cull the Rats!
SourceName: Captain Hayworth;237|large rat;237|large rat;237|large rat;237|large rat;237|large rat;237
SourceText: Are you prepared to join the siege of Killaloe? Excellent! We've been sending troops directly to the keep itself, however we are being overwhelmed by Hibernia and Midgard. We are attempting to flank them but we've run into a problem. Large rat colonies block our flanking lines. Can you aid us by taking out these rats?|||||
StepText:
Kill at least 5 large rats in Killaloe and return to Captain Hayworth.|Kill 4 remaining large rats in Killaloe.|Kill 3 remaining large rats in Killaloe.|Kill 2 remaining large rats in Killaloe.|Kill 1 remaining large rat in Killaloe.

|Go back to Captain Hayworth to retrieve your rewards.
TargetName: large rat;237|large rat;237|large rat;237|large rat;237|large rat;237|Captain Hayworth;237
